google_translated: Don't shoot and hit my brother

en_text: Dammit... if Scar gets shot, it's all over!
jp_text: くっそ　スカーが撃たれちゃ元も子もねぇ
google_translated: The girl who is shot shocked is also a child

en_text: Not being too close or too far is a pain!
jp_text: つかず離れずってのは　しんどい

en_text: When are you going to get here, Homunculus?!
jp_text: まだか　人造人間

en_text: The channel for the military police headquarters is...
jp_text: 憲兵司令部のチャンネルは

en_text: Got it. nothing less to be expected from fuery.
jp_text: あった　さすがだなフュリーめ

en_text: 3rd District Military police unit reporting.
jp_text: こちら　第３区憲兵隊

en_text: We are currently fighting Scar.
jp_text: 現在スカーと交戦中

en_text: Y-You! What... are you doing?!
jp_text: うわっ　貴様何をする　ぐわっ

en_text: All right, the 17th district next.
jp_text: よし 次は１７区だ

en_text: Scar and a boy are engaged in combat!
jp_text: スカーと少年が交戦中

en_text: The boy is a State Alchemist.
jp_text: 少年は国家錬金術師

en_text: The scent of that Ishbalan!
jp_text: あのイシュヴァール人のにおい

en_text: All right, let's go!
jp_text: よし行くぞ

en_text: Which is he after?! human destruction or my automail?!
jp_text: どっちだ　人体破壊か　機械鎧か

en_text: Brother!
jp_text: 兄さん

en_text: He canceled out the decomposition energy?!
jp_text: 分解エネルギーの相殺

en_text: So reckless...
jp_text: ムチャするなぁ

en_text: Tattoos on his right arm!
jp_text: 右腕の入れ墨

en_text: Bastard... so it was you!
jp_text: 野郎　やっぱり

en_text: Hey, how's it going?
jp_text: はい　こんにちは

en_text: You have a strange interior.
jp_text: 君　変わった中身してるねぇ

en_text: How many people do you have inside you?
jp_text: 中に何人いるのかな

en_text: Who?
jp_text: 逃げてもムダだ　貴様独特の気
google_translated: Even if it runs away, it is unique to be unique

en_text: There's no point in trying to run.
jp_text: 逃げてもムダだ　貴様独特の気
google_translated: Even if it runs away, it is unique to be unique

en_text: I can sense your distinct aura from a mile away!
jp_text: 逃げてもムダだ　貴様独特の気
google_translated: Even if it runs away, it is unique to be unique

en_text: Can I eat you?
jp_text: 食べていい

en_text: As I thought!
jp_text: やはり

en_text: A troublesome ability.
jp_text: 邪魔な能力だ

en_text: I don't have to act tough, right?
jp_text: 強がらなくていいんだね

en_text: The scribbling someone made...
jp_text: 誰かが描いてった

en_text: On the wall, of a flower is swaying.
jp_text: 壁の落書きの花が　揺れる

en_text: No one knows their true selves.
jp_text: 自分らしさなんて, 誰もわからないよ
google_translated: I do not know anyone who is selfish

en_text: Even though we both lose and gain
jp_text: 長い長い道の途中で
google_translated: In the middle of a long long way

en_text: And though there may be days loneliness strikes and makes us weep...
jp_text: 急に寂しくなって, 泣いちゃう日もあるけど
google_translated: Suddenly, there is also a day when you cry

en_text: Let's transform our tears and pains to stars.
jp_text: 涙も　痛みも　星に変えよう
google_translated: Tears and pain will change to stars

en_text: Let's light a candle to illuminate our tomorrow. ashita wo terasu akari wo tomosou
jp_text: 明日を照らす　灯りをともそう

en_text: And we'll hold our small hands over the fire to create stardust,
jp_text: 小さな手かざして　ふたりで作ろう

en_text: And an eternity that shines so brilliantly.
jp_text: 星屑を　強く光る永遠を探そう
google_translated: Let's look for the forever who won the stardust strongly

en_text: Farewells may be unavoidable,
jp_text: さよなら　いつかは来るかもしれない

en_text: Yet the seasons continue to change obliviously.
jp_text: 季節はそれでも巡り巡ってく

en_text: Even if I lose myself, I'll continue to walk...
jp_text: 小さく迷っても　歩いてく
google_translated: Walk even if you get lost

en_text: That's the only thing I'd like to never change.
jp_text: それだけは変わらないでいようね

en_text: The shriek of the hurt girl echoes throughout Central.
jp_text: 切り裂かれた少女の悲鳴がセントラルにこだまする
google_translated: The scream of the cracked girl comes to central

en_text: When the trampling force meets his past again,
jp_text: 蹂躙する力が過去と邂逅するとき
google_translated: When the power to be crazy is a long time with the past

en_text: memories of violence are awakened.
jp_text: 暴力の記憶が呼び覚まされる

jp_text: 守りたい　少年はそう思った
